about.title: Our Story
about.story: More than 6 years ago, destiny brought us together in a city café. What started as a casual conversation turned into shared laughter, intertwined dreams, and a love that grew day by day. Today, we want to celebrate this unique moment surrounded by the people we love most.
about.quote: "Love is not just looking at each other, but looking together in the same direction."

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Moments we treasure
gallery.memoryDescription: These are just some of the memories we've created together. Each photo tells a story, each smile reflects our love, and each moment has led us to this special day.
